meanings.definition: The act of specializing or the process of becoming specialized.
meanings.sent1: Her specialisations in art and music make her a well-rounded artist.
meanings.sent2: The university offers a variety of specialisations in business administration.
meanings.sent3: His specialisations in fixing things often lead to interesting DIY projects.
meanings.sent4: The specialisations of the detective were like pieces of a puzzle, fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The specialisations of the chef were evident in the exquisite flavors of the dish.

meanings.definition: A particular area of study or expertise within a larger field.
meanings.sent1: The specialisations of the scientist focused on marine biology.
meanings.sent2: She chose her specialisations in psychology to better understand human behavior.
meanings.sent3: The specialisations of the magician included card tricks and illusions.
meanings.sent4: His specialisations in technology were like magic, making complex systems seem simple.
meanings.sent5: The specialisations of the architect were evident in the unique design of the building.
